keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVESTING IN ALL OUR LOCAL NHS SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Prime Minister visited Boston to mark the announcement of a new, £21.3m A&E, complementing Lincolnshire’s new medical school and enhancements to GP opening hours.

In the whole of this parliament, I’ve voted for Brexit, with or without a deal. Now is the time to get on with delivering what people voted for, and seizing the opportunities that follow. I will always support getting Brexit done.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MORE POLICE, BETTER INFRASTRUCTURE AND STRONGER TOWNS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: From roads to broadband, it’s clear that Lincolnshire needs a Conservative majority government to address the historically unfair lack of funding for rural areas. We will deliver 20,000 extra police officers nationwide and invest £3.6bn in our towns, including Boston & Skegness.
